description.value:
You manipulate the target's genetic code and accelerate the inevitable, pressuring the target to undergo carcinization and become a crab, with effects based on its Fortitude save. A willing target may intentionally choose to take the effects of a critical failure without the clumsy, stupefied or sickened conditions.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's body gains minor features of a crab, its appendages slowly turning into claws and causing it to become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}.

Failure The target transforms into a partial crab-like being, becoming Clumsy 1, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}.

Critical Failure A willing target fully transforms into a crab, as if it had cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wp09USMB3GIW1qbp]{Animal Form} heightened to 5th-rank. An unwilling target does not fully transform and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
